DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare intubation with nerve block with intubation with sedation in awake patients in terms of efficacy, ease, and the rate of complications and physician satisfaction
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Intubation With Nerve Block and With Sedation in Awake Patients
DOC.criteria: Candidate for intubation with methods other than RSI Age>= 18 years Patient or patient's guardian's consent Need for RSI or crash intubation Allergy to Lidocain in block group Allergy to opioid drugs in sedation group Allergy to midazolam in either group
